item.title: 波音公司首席执行官面临参议院质询，继任者寻找步伐加快
item.description: 波音公司一架 737 Max 9 型飞机发生近乎灾难性的事故，危机笼罩着波音公司，首席执行官戴夫-卡尔霍恩（Dave Calhoun）近几个月来越来越低调。【原文：As crisis engulfs Boeing Co. following the near-catastrophic accident on an airborne 737 Max 9 aircraft, Chief Executive Officer Dave Calhoun has kept an increasingly low profile in recent months.】

item.title: 棕榈滩寻求 9500 万美元债券阻止垃圾工外流
item.description: 佛罗里达州的棕榈滩（Palm Beach）以其宫殿式的海滨庄园吸引了世界上最富有、最有权势的人，这里是总统候选人、对冲基金巨头和房地产大亨的居所。【原文：Florida’s Palm Beach has lured some of the world’s wealthiest and most powerful people with its palatial, oceanfront estates home to presidential hopefuls, hedge-fund titans and real-estate tycoons.】

item.title: 华尔街策略师看涨股市，对冲基金却对股市持谨慎态度
item.description: 华尔街的策略师们正急于上调 S&P 500 指数的目标，但由于美联储不愿降息、经济数据疲软以及股市宽度收窄，对冲基金对股市的态度越来越谨慎。【原文：Wall Street strategists are rushing to raise their targets for the S&P 500 Index, but hedge funds are growing increasingly cautious about equities due to the Federal Reserve’s reluctance to cut interest rates, softer economic data and narrow stock market breadth.】

item.title: 美国公司利用债券市场，国债收益率延续反弹势头
item.description: 由于新公司债券的大量发行，以及预计在假期缩短的一周内将进行两次拍卖，国债收益率回吐了上周的部分急剧跌幅。【原文：Treasury yields retraced a portion of last week’s steep declines amid a deluge of new corporate bonds and anticipation of two auctions during a holiday-shortened week.】

item.title: 石油资源丰富的安哥拉银行面临洗钱高风险
item.description: 安哥拉正努力避免被列入全球非法金融观察名单，它说，这个产油国的银行业存在洗钱的 "高风险"。【原文：Angola, which is trying to avoid being added to a global illicit-finance watchlist, said there’s a “high risk” of money laundering in the oil-producing nation’s banking industry.】

item.title: 秘鲁矿商沃尔坎希望进一步出售 2 亿美元资产
item.description: 最近被阿根廷集团Integra Capital收购的秘鲁锌矿商Volcan Cia Minera表示，该公司正在推进出售非核心资产的计划，同时正在与债权人谈判，为未来几年即将到期的一大堆债务进行再融资。【原文：Volcan Cia Minera, the Peruvian zinc miner that was recently acquired by Argentine group Integra Capital, said it is pushing ahead with plans to sell non-core assets as it talks with creditors to refinance a pile of debt coming due in the coming years.】

item.title: 私募股权公司不会停止用债务支付投资者的步伐
item.description: 私募股权投资者要求获得回报的呼声很高。为满足他们的要求，一种冒险的方法创下了记录，而且越来越受欢迎。【原文：Private equity investors are clamoring for their payouts. A risky approach to meeting their demands is setting records — and getting more popular.】

item.title: 旧债券市场策略的新变化吸引数十亿资金投入加密货币项目

item.title: 加拿大新屋开工创七个月来最高水平
item.description: 由于加拿大最大的两个省份加大了公寓、联排别墅和共有公寓的建设力度，加拿大的住房开工率跃升至七个月以来的最高水平。【原文：Canada’s housing starts jumped to the highest level in seven months, as the country’s two largest provinces ramped up construction on apartments, townhouses and condominiums.】

item.title: 美银美林的米德为 2024 年蓝筹债券狂潮放缓做好准备
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp. ）的丹-米德（Dan Mead）预计，美国蓝筹股债券市场的活动将在今年年底前放缓，此前借款人在上半年大举举债，因为他们现在受到诱人收益率的诱惑，而以后则要避免大选波动。【原文：Bank of America Corp.’s Dan Mead expects US blue-chip bond market activity to slow down through the end of this year, after borrowers gorged on debt in the first half, enticed by attractive yields now and avoiding election volatility later.】

item.title: 达赖喇嘛说他尚未考虑转世问题

item.title: 爱尔兰银行出售与杠杆债务组合相关的 SRT

item.title: 莫迪获胜推动印度股市上涨，股票价值突破 5 万亿美元
item.description: 印度的股票市值首次超过 5 万亿美元，最新的推动力来自印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪的新联盟对世界上增长最快的主要经济体政策连续性的承诺。【原文：India’s stock market value is exceeding $5 trillion for the first time, with the latest boost coming from a commitment by Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s new coalition for policy continuity in the world’s fastest growing major economy.】

item.title: 零售基金在大赚 480 亿美元后潜心研究量化因子 ETF
item.description: 交易员们在以量化为动力的股票交易上斥资数十亿美元，推动了这种投资风格的发展，而在传统大盘股指数上的简单押注已获得丰厚回报的时代，这种投资风格却一直难以获得青睐。【原文：Traders are lavishing billions of dollars on quant-powered stock trades, boosting an investing style that’s struggled to gain traction in an era when simple bets on traditional large-cap indexes have paid off handsomely.】

item.title: 先锋集团称美联储的谨慎态度将阻碍加拿大降息
item.description: Vanguard Group 经济学家 Roger Aliaga-Diaz 表示，在政策制定者确信美联储已经准备好开始降低借贷成本之前，加拿大央行可能会对大幅降息犹豫不决。【原文：The Bank of Canada may hesitate to make aggressive rate cuts until policymakers feel assured the Federal Reserve is ready to start lowering borrowing costs, Vanguard Group economist Roger Aliaga-Diaz said.】

item.title: 俄罗斯大亨乌斯马诺夫就洗钱报告起诉瑞银集团
